comments.author: kaie@kuix.de
comments.text:
Complaint from a user:

If you click a link outside of Firefox, and Firefox is automatically started, Firefox should not distract the user by checking for addon updates.

Proposal:

Don't check for adddon updates on application start.

Only check when the user is idle.
